mapper.select: SELECT C.LOCATION_NO, B.TITLE , C.RECRUITS_NUM , C.RECRUITS_CURR, C.IS_END FROM CARPOOL C JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO JOIN UPPER_CATEGORY UC ON UC.CATEGORY_U_NO = B.CATEGORY_U_NO WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND UC.CATEGORY_U_NO = 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARPOOL(BOARD_NO , RECRUITS_NUM , RECRUITS_CURR , LOCATION_NO , PRICE , START_TIME , END_TIME , ORIGIN , DESTINATION) VALUES(#{boardNo} , #{recruitsNum} , #{recruitsCurr} , #{locationNo} , #{price} , #{startTime} , #{endTime} , #{origin} , #{destination})
mapper.select: SELECT C.BOARD_NO , RECRUITS_NUM, RECRUITS_CURR, IS_END, C.LOCATION_NO, PRICE, START_TIME, END_TIME, ORIGIN, DESTINATION, SC.CATEGORY_S_NAME, B.CATEGORY_S_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, L.LOCATION_NAME, I.CHANGE_NAME, IMG_NO, FILE_LEVEL, I.STATUS, M.PHONE, M.USER_ID, M.USER_NO, M.GENDER FROM CARPOOL C JOIN BOARD B USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN LOCATION L USING(LOCATION_NO) JOIN IMAGE I USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.CATEGORY_S_NO = SC.CATEGORY_S_NO WHERE C.BOARD_NO = #{bNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND I.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT C.BOARD_NO , C.RECRUITS_NUM, C.RECRUITS_CURR, C.IS_END, C.LOCATION_NO, C.PRICE, C.START_TIME, C.END_TIME, C.ORIGIN, C.DESTINATION, SC.CATEGORY_S_NAME, SC.CATEGORY_S_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, L.LOCATION_NAME, I.CHANGE_NAME, I.IMG_NO, I.FILE_LEVEL, I.STATUS, M.PHONE, M.USER_ID, M.USER_NO, M.GENDER FROM CARPOOL C JOIN BOARD B USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN LOCATION L USING(LOCATION_NO) JOIN IMAGE I USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_NO) LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.CATEGORY_S_NO = SC.CATEGORY_S_NO WHERE C.BOARD_NO = #{bNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND I.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE CARPOOL SET PRICE = #{price}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, END_TIME = #{endTime}, LOCATION_NO = #{locationNo}, ORIGIN = #{origin}, DESTINATION = #{destination} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
